revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Open Mesh |model=A60 |asin=B06X6M6HJ3 |price=225 |fcc_date=01/10/2017 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |type=outdoor access point, mesh hub |fcc_id=WT8OMA60 |ic_id=10103A-OMA60 |pwr_v=48-54 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835FMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16BG-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A, FU626280, 1628, CHINA; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035 |eth_chip3_brand=Atheros |eth_chip3_model=AR8033 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''1300Mbps''' - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''450Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1750 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|WiFi Access Point}} :[https://www.openmesh.com/products/wifi Product page] {{•}} [https://store.openmesh.com/products/access-points/a60-grouped-cloud-managed-access-point.html Support page] {{•}} [https://www.open-mesh.com/skin/frontend/rwd/default/media/A-Series-Datasheet.pdf A-Series Datasheet] "7016A1290004 V:1.00" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{see also|Open Mesh A40|Open Mesh A42}} ===Hardware Info=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558-AT4A (FK637748, 1637) *Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L12835FMI-10G (MXIC B162804) *PoE: ATS 1536R, Atech 1629; TR: 2x 1634 HN2463G ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33136-open-mesh-a40-a60-access-points-reviewed ''Open Mesh A40 & A60 Access Points Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.mbreviews.com/open-mesh-a60-review/ '' Open Mesh A60 Access Point Reviewed'' on '''MBReviews''']
